card.name: Flaxen Intruder
card.text: Whenever Flaxen Intruder deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. When you do, destroy target artifact or enchantment. Welcome Home {5}{G}{G} Sorcery — Adventure Create three 2/2 green Bear creature tokens.

card.name: Lovestruck Beast
card.text: Lovestruck Beast can't attack unless you control a 1/1 creature. Heart's Desire {G} Sorcery — Adventure Create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

card.name: Oko, Thief of Crowns
card.text: +2: Create a Food token. +1: Target artifact or creature loses all abilities and becomes a green Elk creature with base power and toughness 3/3. −5: Exchange control of target artifact or creature you control and target creature an opponent controls with power 3 or less.
